A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was rich in Star Wars lore\, while at the same time flipping everything we thought we knew on it's head. It had me on the she of my seat laughing\, in suspense\, and emotional. Rian Johnson did a fantastic job. I welcomed the changes to the Star Wats status quo\, and I'm excited to see what Johnson can bring us in his future new Star Wars trilogy.
